metadata.source: Red Team Qualitative Evaluation Report + GTA Monitoring Standards
metadata.description: Gold standard filters for 20 evaluation prompts. Each entry defines the 'correct' structured filters an LLM should select when translating the natural language prompt.

prompts.prompt: What tariffs has the US imposed on China since Jan 2025?
prompts.notes: All four dimensions captured. intervention_types=['Import tariff'] is correct per Monitoring Standard #1.

prompts.prompt: Which countries have imposed tariffs affecting US exports in 2025?
prompts.notes: Missing gta_evaluation=['Harmful'] was the key gap. 'Imposed tariffs' implies harmful measures, not liberalising tariff reductions.

prompts.prompt: What export controls has China imposed on rare earth elements?
prompts.notes: Correctly uses MAST P for export measures + query for product narrowing. Rare earths span many HS codes, so text search is acceptable here.

prompts.prompt: Which countries have restricted exports of lithium or cobalt since 2022?
prompts.alternative_approach: Run two separate searches: one for lithium HS codes, one for cobalt HS codes
prompts.notes: CRITICAL failure: query='lithium cobalt' returns 0 results (AND logic). Must use HS product codes. Use gta_lookup_hs_codes first to find codes for lithium and cobalt.

prompts.prompt: What measures currently affect semiconductor manufacturing equipment trade?
prompts.notes: Overly broad with just query='semiconductor'. Needs trade-related MAST chapters (D/E/P) at minimum. HS codes for semiconductor equipment preferred.

prompts.prompt: What subsidies are governments providing for critical mineral processing?
prompts.notes: Correct: mast_chapters=['L'] for subsidies + query for narrowing. Well-translated.

prompts.prompt: Which countries subsidise their domestic semiconductor industry?
prompts.notes: CRITICAL failure: identical filters to prompt 5 (no mast_chapters). 'Subsidise' must map to mast_chapters=['L']. Without it, returns all 747 semiconductor results including non-subsidies.

prompts.prompt: Which G20 countries have increased state aid to EV manufacturers since 2022?
prompts.notes: Missing G20 implementer constraint. Must use jurisdiction-groups resource to get G20 member codes.

prompts.prompt: What harmful measures has the EU imposed on US exports since 2024?
prompts.notes: Excellent. All four dimensions captured. gta_evaluation=['Harmful'] correctly used.

prompts.prompt: What measures has Brazil implemented affecting US agricultural exports?
prompts.notes: CRITICAL failure: no agricultural filter returns 1000+ noise results. Must use HS chapters 01-24 or agricultural CPC sectors.

prompts.prompt: Find all anti-dumping investigations targeting Chinese steel since 2020
prompts.notes: Follows Monitoring Standard #1 correctly. Steel spans many HS codes so text search is appropriate here.

prompts.prompt: What safeguard measures are currently in force on solar panels?
prompts.notes: Minor issue: query='solar' can match non-solar records. HS 854140 (photovoltaic cells) is more precise.

prompts.prompt: What local content requirements affect automotive production in Southeast Asia?
prompts.notes: Missing automotive filter. Good SE Asia mapping. Should add HS chapter 87 codes or query='automotive'.

prompts.prompt: What import licensing requirements affect pharmaceutical products in India?
prompts.notes: Precise. India correctly coded. Structured type + text query for product narrowing.

prompts.prompt: Has the use of export restrictions increased since 2020?
prompts.notes: Count query with MAST P for export measures. Include years before 2020 for baseline comparison.

prompts.prompt: How many harmful interventions were implemented globally in 2025 versus 2024?
prompts.notes: Uses gta_evaluation=['Harmful'] and implementation_period for correct date dimension.

prompts.prompt: Which interventions target state-owned enterprises specifically?
prompts.notes: Correct structural field: eligible firms category 4 = state-controlled enterprises.

prompts.prompt: What subnational measures has the US implemented since 2023?
prompts.notes: Excellent. implementation_level=[3] for subnational.

prompts.prompt: What FDI screening measures target Chinese investments in European technology sectors?
prompts.notes: Missing European implementer constraint. At minimum use EUN for EU-level, or full EU-27 + GBR list.

prompts.prompt: What measures have G7 countries coordinated against Russia since February 2022?
prompts.notes: Structurally correct but very broad (1000 result ceiling). 'Coordinated' is an analytical judgment that cannot be filtered structurally.

generalization_prompts.prompt: What export controls target nickel and cobalt supply chains?
generalization_prompts.notes: Generalization: commodity not in original 20. Must use HS lookup for nickel + cobalt codes. affected_products left empty because they come from lookup tool.

generalization_prompts.prompt: What investment restrictions have ASEAN countries imposed since 2023?
generalization_prompts.notes: Generalization: geographic group not tested. Tests ASEAN lookup + MAST I mapping.

generalization_prompts.prompt: What data localization requirements exist in Asian countries?
generalization_prompts.notes: Generalization: services/digital query. Tests whether LLM uses query appropriately for policy concept not in structured filters.

generalization_prompts.prompt: Which trade policy measures were modified in the last 3 months?
generalization_prompts.notes: Generalization: temporal/monitoring query. Tests date_modified_gte usage. Date is relative (3 months before eval date).

generalization_prompts.prompt: What EU anti-dumping duties target Chinese steel products since 2023?
generalization_prompts.notes: Generalization: complex multi-filter. Tests 4+ simultaneous filters.
